Articles.Content: we console players on Xbox and Playstation (enhanced edition) are stuck in KSP Version 1.5, whilst PC and Laptop players are playing 1.11 and 1.12. nobody is giving anyone answers and it sucks. i want to see the new fireworks, solar panels, mun arc... thing. but we can't. i don't know why we can't see these latest  versions of KSP and i do't think we will see that light of day EVER.

9 hours ago, obamaprism9623 said:

we console players on Xbox and Playstation (enhanced edition) are stuck in KSP Version 1.5, whilst PC and Laptop players are playing 1.11 and 1.12. nobody is giving anyone answers and it sucks. i want to see the new fireworks, solar panels, mun arc... thing. but we can't. i don't know why we can't see these latest  versions of KSP and i do't think we will see that light of day EVER.

Its actually 1.10. I played console. A long time ago. I just got the game on my laptop.

I also came from PS4 (where I originally found this jewel KSP). So I think it's a good idea for KSP2 to be published on consoles again (marketing!) . And the main reason I changed to PC version was that *!**!*!*# SAVE bug on Playstation.  Oh no, it was the Real Solar System mod... o.k., but also this game breaking bug on PS4. So no, I don't think we will see a well developed KSP2 for consoles.

2 hours ago, Aerodynamic Kerbal said:

we are still stuck even then
